name: Homegear::updateGroup
description: This method updates the names or the ACL of an existing group.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: The ID of the group as returned by createGroup() or getGroups().

parameters.name: translations
parameters.description: The name of the group in different languages. The keys are the lower case ISO 639-1 language codes and the upper case ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes seperated by a dash (e. g. en-US or fr-FR). The values are the group names in the different languages.

parameters.name: acl
parameters.description: The Access Control List (ACL) to assign to the group. See createGroup() for information about the ACL structure.
